duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide superior customer service and take orders from customers by telephone or in person.
Prepare, package, and merchandise fresh product on a daily basis while maintaining all department and food safety/sanitation standards.
Use suggestive selling techniques and basic product knowledge to meet customer needs and build department sales.
Clean and sanitize display cases, operate/maintain equipment properly, and comply with H-E-B food safety and sanitation standards.
Perform additional department-specific responsibilities such as recording production and shrink, inventory management, and ensuring catering orders are prepared and ready for customer pickup.
Educate customers on preparation/reheating instructions of prepared foods, prepackage condiments, and perform food preparation tasks.
Function in a fast-paced retail environment, in detailed and precise tasks, and work with customers staying attentive to their needs.
Demonstrate the ability to lift and manage heavy weights as required for the specific department.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, or equivalent, and completion of Company Orientation, and food safety and sanitation training upon hire
